select.if: SELECT count(distinct personid) from t_severity where stype='1' and severity=#{Severity} and personid in (SELECT personid from t_personinformation where bailoutbegindate <= now() and now() <= bailoutenddate and sponsoralarm in (SELECT mjbh from fsga_yw_ryb where bmbm like concat('%',#{Code},'%'))) and datetimes >= substring(#{StartTime},0,8) and datetimes <=substring(#{EndTime},0,8)

SELECT count(distinct personid) from t_severity where stype='2' and severity=#{Severity} and personid in (SELECT personid from t_personinformation where bailoutbegindate<= now() and now()<= bailoutenddate and sponsoralarm in (SELECT mjbh from fsga_yw_ryb where bmbm like concat('%',#{Code},'%'))) and datetimes >= substring(#{StartTime},0,8) and datetimes <=substring(#{EndTime},0,8)

mapper.select: SELECT CAST( max(signbool) as text) as num,personid from t_severity where personid in (SELECT personid from t_personinformation where bailoutbegindate<= now() and now()<= bailoutenddate and sponsoralarm in (SELECT mjbh from fsga_yw_ryb where bmbm like concat('%',#{Code},'%'))) and datetimes >= substring(#{StartTime},0,8) and datetimes <=substring(#{EndTime},0,8) group by personid

SELECT (SELECT count(*) from t_personinformation where bailoutbegindate>= date_trunc('month',current_date) and bailoutbegindate <=date_trunc('month',current_date) + interval'1 month -1 day' and suspectstatuscode='1') as Bailmonth, (SELECT count(*) from t_personinformation where bailoutbegindate >= date_trunc('month',current_date) and bailoutbegindate <=date_trunc('month',current_date) + interval'1 month - 1 day' and suspectstatuscode='2') as Prisonmonth, ( SELECT count(*) from t_personinformation where bailoutbegindate>= date_trunc('year',current_date) and bailoutbegindate <=date_trunc('year',current_date) + interval'1 year - 1 day' or (bailoutenddate>= date_trunc('year',current_date) and bailoutenddate <=date_trunc('year',current_date) + interval'1 year - 1 day' ) and (suspectstatuscode='2' or suspectstatuscode='1')) as bailyear, (SELECT count(*) from t_personinformation where bailoutenddate>= date_trunc('month',current_date) and bailoutenddate <=date_trunc('month',current_date) + interval'1 month - 1 day' and (suspectstatuscode='2' or suspectstatuscode='1')) as Maturitybail, (SELECT count(DISTINCT personid) from t_summons where reporttime is NULL and TO_TIMESTAMP(summonsendtime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >=date_trunc('month',current_date) and TO_TIMESTAMP(summonsendtime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <=date_trunc('month',current_date) + interval'1 month - 1 day') as Arraignmentnumber, (SELECT count(DISTINCT personid) from t_prisonsetting where settingname='位置监控' and settingtime <=date_trunc('month',current_date) + interval'1 month - 1 day') as positionnumber, (SELECT count(DISTINCT personid) from t_summons where reporttime is NULL and TO_TIMESTAMP(summonsendtime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >=date_trunc('year',current_date) and TO_TIMESTAMP(summonsendtime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <=date_trunc('year',current_date) + interval'1 year - 1 day') as AnnualsummonsNum, (SELECT count(DISTINCT personid) from t_personmessage where messagetime>=date_trunc('year',current_date) and messagetime <=date_trunc('year',current_date) + interval'1 year - 1 day') as Annuallocation, (SELECT count(DISTINCT personid ) from t_personmessage where messagetime>=date_trunc('month',current_date) and messagetime <=date_trunc('month',current_date) + interval'1 month - 1 day') as monthnumber

SELECT t.*,u.aliasname as userName from t_log as t left join t_user as u on u.id=t.operator where operator=#{Userid} and to_date(to_char(operatingtime,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_date(to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') order by t.id desc limit 30

select * from t_message where t_message.personid in( SELECT t_personinformation.personid from t_personinformation where sponsoralarm=#{UserName}) and to_date(to_char(t_message.messagetime,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')>to_date(to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
mapper.update: update t_personinformation set violationcode=#{code} where personid=#{personid}
mapper.select: select count(personid) from t_personinformation where suspectstatuscode=#{type} and substring(to_char(bailoutbegindate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),0,8)=substring(#{Limitedmonth},0,8)
